Bob Neeser
Senior Vice President Sales
December 18, 2008, Bob managed Jason directly

When you meet a person for the first time in person and that meeting is on the beach at the St. Thomas, V. I., Ritz Carlton for Presidents Club honoring your best selling Business Partners, that can be pretty hard to top.Well, that is where I first met Jason. And our relationship as a matter of fact improved greatly from that point!  Over the next several years working with Jason, first as an award winning Sage Business Partner and later as a client while he worked for TeleLogic both prior to and following the IBM acquisition my admiration and respect for him only increases. Actually it increased to the point where I hired Jason to manage two teams at Sage- the Professional Services team and the Sales Engineering team.Shortly after taking the position Jason delivered a plan laying out his vision for organizing the two teams in a way that enhanced career pathing, skills development and optimized our resource pool while focusing on our top clients and best new sales opportunities. I was really impressed and immediately endorsed hs plan.  The results were nothing short of outstanding>In case you could not already tell, I think Jason is absolutely fantastic. His people skills, leadership, sales and outstanding technical skills are a rare blend.  I enthusiastically recommend Jason and would be more than happy to talk to you about him.Bob

Sheryn Murray
Senior Vice President of Operations at Insight Investments, LLC
May 3, 2016, Jason worked with Sheryn in different groups

Many times as a sales leader you end up with a love / hate relationship dealing with Credit and Finance departments. It can sometimes end up as a classic battle between the art of getting a deal signed and the science of making sure it gets done within acceptable guidelines. That's where the people you work with make all of the difference in the world. Sheryn consistently works in a professional and timely manner to support the business. I always knew that I could trust Sheryn in any customer situation while keeping an eye on the end of fiscal period madness that arises each and every month.  She has an impeccable reputation and work ethic that will fit in with any organization.

summary: 20+ year background within the Customer Relationship Management "CRM" industry. I understand the kinds of problems, Sales VPs, CMOs, CSOs & CIOs face when making a decision around implementing a CRM platform. My customers get up and running with a cloud-based or on premise CRM platform more quickly and at a lower cost than they expected to address key functional areas of:• Salesforce Automation• Social Listening & Insights• Marketing Automation• Service Automation• Enterprise Collaboration• Document Management
